entry.title: 速读 - Fully Convolutional Networks for Semantic Segmentation
entry.content: 资料 Paper Code 概览 Prior Work Contributions 内容 Idea 1: From classiﬁer to dense FCN Idea 2: Skip Architectures Details Loss: per-pixel, unnormalized softmax loss 与 sigmoid crossentropy loss实验效果相同 Augmentation: 随机 mirroring 和 jittering，无明显效果

entry.title: 道路场景语义分割
